p: For literature searches in Nature.com, Google Scholar, MDPI and government reports, the following keywords were used: infectious diseases, pathogens, vectors, viral infection, bacterial infection, extreme climatic events, climate change, temperature, precipitation, ocean warm-up, disease transmission, policies, adaptation, human, response, education, public health and social response. The mentioned searched terms were precisely chosen to explore across databases and to fulfill the selection criteria as much as possible.
